useCase.name: View List of Orders Being Delivered

mainSequence.step: Shipper Views List of Orders Being Delivered
Shipper Retrieves Orders Being Delivered from Dashboard
Dashboard Requests Orders Being Delivered from Controller
Controller Gets Orders Being Delivered from Service
Service Retrieves Orders with Status "IN_TRANSIT" from Repository
Repository Queries Orders with Status "IN_TRANSIT" from Database
Database Returns Order Data to Repository
Repository Returns Order Data to Service
Service Returns Order Data to Controller
Controller Returns Order Data to Dashboard
Dashboard Displays List of Orders Being Delivered
